org.ow2.proactive.utils

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.utils.Tools

  • @PublicAPI
public class Tools
extends Object
    Provides some methods used by the scheduler or the GUI to display some tips properly.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9

      • getFormattedDuration

        public static String getFormattedDuration(long start,
                                          long end)
        Format 2 long times into a single duration as a String. The string will contains the duration in Days, hours, minutes, seconds, and millis.
        Parameters:
        start - the first date (time)
        end - the second date (time)
        Returns:
        the duration as a formatted string.

      • formatDate

        public static long formatDate(String pattern)
        Format the given string and return a long that correspond to the time represented by the given string. If the string is not proper, 0 will be returned.
        Parameters:
        pattern - a time pattern that must be in [[HH:]MM:]SS where HH, MM, and SS are numbers
        Returns:
        a long corresponding to the given time.

      • getHostURL

        Normalize the given URL into an URL that only contains protocol://host:port/
        Parameters:
        url - the url to transform
        Returns:
        an URL that only contains protocol://host:port/

      • parseCommandLine

        public static String[] parseCommandLine(String cmdLine)
        Parse a command line in order to split it into a string array. This method provides the parsing as followed :
        - It is split according to the 'white space' character.
        - It is possible to escape white space character using the '%' character.
        - To write this '%' special char, just escape it ( '%%' ).
        For example, the string "cmd arg1 arg% 2 arg%%% 3 arg4%% 5" will return the following string array :
        [cmd,arg1,arg 2,arg% 3,arg4%,5]

        This method can be mostlikely used for Runtime.exec(String[]) method.

        Parameters:
        cmdLine - The command line to parse.
        Returns:
        a string array that represents the parsed command line.

      • shellExtension

        public static String shellExtension()

        public static String[] dataSpaceConfigPropertyToUrls(String property)

        Returns:

      • parsePeriod

        public static long parsePeriod(String periodString)
        Translates time period string into milliseconds. Period string should contain symbol indication length of the period:
        • 's' - seconds
        • 'm' - minutes
        • 'h' - hours
        • 'd' - days
        Examples of valid time period expressions:
        • '1m' - one minute
        • '1d 10h' - one day and ten hours

      • logAvailableScriptEngines

        public static void logAvailableScriptEngines(org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        Log available script engines at INFO level.
        Parameters:
        logger - the logger instance used to log available script engines.
